Drawing

Class TextBoxManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawing.ClickBoxManager
      • Drawing.TextBoxManager

  • public class TextBoxManager
extends ClickBoxManager
    the textbox manager is used to make it easier to draw menu's in this class we also give functionallity to the menuboxes.
